body.p: 1. Father of the Edomite king Baal-hanan before the establishment of Israel’s monarchy (Gn 36:38-39; 1 Chr 1:49).

2. Micaiah’s son, courtier of King Josiah of the southern kingdom of Judah. Josiah sent Acbor in a delegation to ask Huldah the prophetess about the newly found Book of the Law (2 Kgs 22:12-14). Acbor was also referred to as Abdon, son of Micah (2 Chr 34:20). He was the father of Elnathan (Jer 26:22; 36:12).
